1405590.name: RPG Maker MZ - Futuristic Dungeons
1405590.description:
Fly off to the future and create fantastic futuristic maps with this new graphic asset pack from Rinober! Featuring Tiles A1-A5, Inside B-E1 and E2 tile sets for tons of futuristic variations. Also comes with a set of Alt tiles for variations in tile outlines. Also included are 9 futuristic parallaxes and tons of sheets of objects including gates, mining items, dungeon items, male and female statues and holograms, and 2 sprite sheets of female and male walking characters with tons of variations (clothing, hair etc)

Features:

* Massive collection of futuristic tiles, characters and objects
* 16 unique characters, 362 character sets in total, 11 unique tilesets, 22 tilesets in total (including Alts), 9 parallaxes

- 11 tilesets with which you can create modern and futuristic-looking dungeons, alien worlds, and more "classic" looking caves.
- 16 unique characters with numerous variations.
- 38 character sets with objects such as doors, chests, traps and more things that are useful for the creation of dungeons.
- 9 parallaxes for the creation of background effects.
- Each graphic comes in two possible styles: one with black outlines, the other one with colored outlines for less contrast. As there are also many variations for characters, there is a numeration system

* For use with RPG Maker MZ or the engine of your choice!
1405590.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
